result.execSummary:
Destiny Rose Xiong was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Destiny Rose Xiong was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Destiny Rose Xiong

records.addlTxt:
4:22 PM Defendant Destiny Rose Xiong in court, in custody.  Attorney Zachary Derksen in court for Destiny Rose Xiong.  Attorney Claudia T. Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State has now prepared paperwork for waiver of extradition. Def and all parties sign paperwork in Court. State places documents in the envelopes and seals in Court.
Extradition hearing on October 26, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

8:56 AM Defendant Destiny Rose Xiong appeared by phone, in custody.  Attorney Zachary Derksen appeared by phone for Destiny Rose Xiong.  Attorney Claudia T. Johnson appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Atty Derksen advises that the def will sign the waiver for extradition. Court will set an in person hearing for later on today,
Extradition hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

Status conference on October 26, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Extradition hearing on November 16, 2022 at 11:45 am.

11:27 AM Defendant Destiny Rose Xiong in court, in custody.  Attorney Mitchell Reagan LaCombe in court for Destiny Rose Xiong.  Prosecuting attorney Claudia T. Johnson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of rights. Received complaint/waived reading. Extradition hearing requested. Probable cause found in the complaint. Bond set.
Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Extradition hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 11:45 am.
